column1: If set to Yes, stock filter will respect system backorders configuration for determining product stock status
column2: If set to Yes, stock filter will respect system backorders configuration for determining product stock status

column1: If set to Yes, stock filter will consider product quantity for No Backorders mode. Products with qty ≤ 0 will be considered out of stock.
column2: If set to Yes, stock filter will consider product quantity for No Backorders mode. Products with qty ≤ 0 will be considered out of stock.
